EmailTemplate.name: Test_BizStarter_NonResponsive
EmailTemplate.subject: Following up on our conversation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you again for giving me the opportunity to discuss your business plans.
Having helped many people get their businesses started, I understand that starting a business is a big decision and sometimes takes weeks and even months before you feel comfortable enough to move forward.
Along the way, please understand that I am available to answer any questions that may come up and my commitment to you remains unchanged--- to do whatever possible to help make sure you have the right information to make the best decisions—and hopefully, save you money in the process!
I am available at (855) 787-1921 Monday–Friday from 8 a.m.–5 p.m. PT or email me anytime at BizHelp@legalzoom.com
Finally, if you prefer for me to remove you from my contact list, please just let me know as I want to respect your time.
Katherine C. Business Account Manager (855) 787-1921 BizHelp@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: $EMAIL_ADDRESS_$
